alert.note: Alert for Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 30 at 3:52PM CDT until March 30 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 77 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 PARISH IN NORTHEAST LOUISIANA CONCORDIA IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 31 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ATTALA CHOCTAW COPIAH HINDS HOLMES HUMPHREYS LEAKE MADISON RANKIN SCOTT SIMPSON YAZOO IN EAST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI NESHOBA WINSTON IN NORTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI CARROLL GRENADA LEFLORE MONTGOMERY WEBSTER IN NORTHEAST MISSISSIPPI CLAY LOWNDES OKTIBBEHA IN NORTHWEST MISSISSIPPI SUNFLOWER IN SOUTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI LAWRENCE LINCOLN IN SOUTHWEST MISSISSIPPI ADAMS CLAIBORNE FRANKLIN JEFFERSON IN WEST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI SHARKEY WARREN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ACKERMAN, ANGUILLA, BELZONI, BRANDON, BROOKHAVEN, BUDE, CANTON, CARROLLTON, CARTHAGE, COLUMBUS, CRYSTAL SPRINGS, DURANT, EUPORA, FAYETTE, FERRIDAY, FOREST, GOODMAN, GREENWOOD, GRENADA, HAZLEHURST, INDIANOLA, ISOLA, JACKSON, KOSCIUSKO, LEXINGTON, LOUISVILLE, MADISON, MAGEE, MATHISTON, MEADVILLE, MENDENHALL, MONTICELLO, MORTON, NATCHEZ, NEW HEBRON, NORTH CARROLLTON, PEARL, PEARL RIVER, PHILADELPHIA, PICKENS, PORT GIBSON, RICHLAND, RIDGELAND, ROLLING FORK, ROXIE, RULEVILLE, STARKVILLE, TCHULA, VAIDEN, VICKSBURG, VIDALIA, WEIR, WESSON, WEST FERRIDAY, WEST POINT, WINONA, AND YAZOO CITY.
